lore:
"This is a splendid crown. It's probably worth a good amount of Zel. But things are only things in the end, given random monetary value by others. The only treasure I care about, is the treasure that resides within me!"

(An excerpt from Chapter 4, Section 1 of "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Pirates of the Evening Calm!")
name: 대괴도신의 보물왕관
